pullRequest.title: [Bug] Fix the bug of NULL do not show in CTE statement.
pullRequest.bodyText:
All Column create in inlineView will set allowNull = false, which will cause NULL data in CTE be process will be ignore.
So we should set column in inlineView allowNull to make sure correct of query.

[Bug] Fix the bug of NULL do not show in CTE statement.

issue:#4926

nodes.bodyText: Unfortunately, we cannot directly obtain the information about whether slot desc is nullable or not from Expr.
